ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide.exception

Class InvalidTrialException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide.exception.InvalidTrialException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InvalidTrialException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Generic exception which represents an error while parsing a trial specification file.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    Liam de Valmency (lpdv1g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Aleksandar Botev (ab9g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Dionisio Perez-Mavrogenis (dpm3g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Kim Svensson (ks6g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    See Also:

        lineNum - The line of the specification file on which the error occurred.
